  • Classes in renderer used by game.logic 
    Class and Description
    R_AbstractCamera
    This class represents a camera in the renderer
    R_AbstractModel
    This class holds a R_AbstractModelData object and draws it in the correct position, orientation and scale
    R_AbstractModelData
    This abstract class holds the data used to draw the models
    R_Player
    This class represents a player model.
    R_Player.Team 
    Renderer
    Provides a class for rendering a 3d scene to a buffered image.
